name: LaTeX Dark Mode
description: Fixes wierd LaTeX rendering (esp. on AoPS) on Dark Mode with Dark Reader
additional_info:
Userstyle info:
    -Designed for use with Stylus, an AMAZING userstyle extesion:
    -https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/stylus/clngdbkpkpeebahjckkjfobafhncgmne
    -Extremely small code -- good for slow connections!
    -Please share with your friends/colleagues!
    -Especially useful on renderers such as AoPS's TeXeR: 
    -https://www.artofproblemsolving.com
    -The screenshot comes from the TeXeR, using Dark Reader: 
    -https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/dark-reader/eimadpbcbfnmbkopoojfekhnkhdbieeh
    -Normally, LaTeX renders in Black, which is hard to see against a dark background
    -This small piece of code renders it in off-white, which is easy to see in Dark Mode
    -I recommend using these settings on Dark Reader for general purposes:
    -Dark, Brightness +5, Contrast +10, Sepia +10, Grayscale +5
